overview: Velocyto is a computational tool for the analysis of RNA velocity, which aims to estimate the future state of individual cells in single-cell RNA sequencing data. It provides algorithms for inferring the direction and rate of change in gene expression at the single-cell level, offering insights into cellular dynamics and differentiation.
core_features: Estimation of RNA velocity in single-cell gene expression data
Analysis of cell state transitions and differentiation trajectories
Integration with common single-cell RNA sequencing analysis pipelines
Visualization tools for exploring cellular dynamics
